Riddles: What has a head, a tail, is brown, and can't be caught?
What has a heart but no other organs?
What has a mouth but cannot speak, moves but has no legs, and has a bed but never sleeps?
What has a mouth but cannot speak, runs but never walks, and has a bed but never sleeps?
What has a mouth but never speaks, moves but never walks, and has a bed but never sleeps?
